--- In gladiator@y..., bluedrgnkid@a... wrote:
> Hey, maybe you could promote Cleric to ArchBishop, a person who had 
a "holy 
> arrow" recolor of the mage's attack as theirs. Like when you hold 
attack and 
> throw the fireballs.

"High Priest" is going to be a promotion of Cleric, but I am open to 
characters having some choices about what they promote to (Practical 
Mage and Archmage would both) as long as all the promoted choices are 
fully stocked with abilities.

I am not complaining.

I was going to start discussion about "High Priest" on Wednesday, and 
on either Friday or Saturday bring up "Practical Mage".  If I think up 
 a couple of abilities with another potential promoted class, I'll 
bring that one up.  I want to do a promotion of druid, because it 
seems so natural (hahahaha).

The basic attack for an asassin would be throwing a dagger if the 
opponent was a pretty good distance away and for up close it would be 
using a sword to slash opponents.

When we get through this topic, I'll start work compiling a text 
document with the requested changes to characters.
